channel.title: The real history project
channel.description:
Hey so i guess i told the public about my retard idea and i came up with something that might not be dumb. Would it be a good idea to make transitional contacts. If that is a dumb idea they fuck you the other post with the plunger and shit was a joke. So tell me if that could buy out any companies or merge with another company.
Project goals: To invent an idea that would buy out another company that sells a similar item or merge with another company to sell your item.
*NOTE* If you do not know what transitional glasses are, they are glasses that look pretty clear in a normal lighted room and when you go outside the dye that is put into the glasses will tint them and make it so that you will not have sun in your eyes.
Please tell me if i should let go of the idea or not.

item.title: The real history project
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I still thought it was a great idea, but it does makes sense that it wouldn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: The real history project
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

rip4d:

It would never work. First of all, they can take a while to transition, and not being able to take them out absolutely whenever you want can be a hindrance. Also, the chemicals would probably cause some damage to your eyes, along with your eyes looking completely dark-brown (that would actually be kinda cool tbh).

awwww :[ thanks for replying though

Read full topic
